content: I’m Currently a third year PhD student working under professor Natalia Ivanova at the University of Alberta. My Current research focuses on testing a more generalized and improved magnetic braking prescription described in Pavlovskii et al. 2015. Using MESA  and the resources provided by Compute Canada , I simulate a grid of initial binaries and compare the results to observed systems.

title: Kenny X. Van
